fields.summary: CLI: Build - If you have 3.2.0 CLI with 3.2.1 SDK selected in CLI and in tiapp.xml, then "Invalid platform "undefined"" message is returned

fields.description:
trying to build a project to windows simulator with new SDK (Feb 5) using this command:

http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/mobile/3_2_X_hybrid/mobilesdk-3.2.1.v20140205180128-win32.zip

I get the following Error ( see attachment )
fields.summary: Windows Hybrid: cannot build project with new CI Build Feb 5

comments.body: The latest Windows Hybrid is based on Titanium SDK 3.2.1 and requires Titanium CLI 3.2.1. As of right now, CLI 3.2.1 is not GA. You can install a beta release by running {{npm install -g titanium@3.2.1-beta}}.
does alloy need to go beta as well?
I'm still getting the same error after the update to titanium 3.2.1-beta

when I do "titanium build -p mobileweb" it does not recognize the value of -p

still returns undefined.

ok that fixed that, however I get an "options" undefined error

I am trying to do a simple "titanium build -p mobileweb"

Here is the output 
========================================================
PS C:\Titanium_Studio_Workspace\ImageTSS> titanium build -p mobileweb

Closing ticket as Windows Hybrid is no longer supported.
